name: HTMX-API-WP
author: Esteban Cuevas
description: An un-official WordPress plugin that adds HTMX to your WordPress site.

scripts.update-htmx: cp -r node_modules/htmx.org/dist/htmx.min.js assets/js/ && cp -r node_modules/htmx.org/dist/ext/* assets/js/ext/
scripts.postinstall: npm run update-htmx && npm run update-hyperscript
